data.title: skyledger.net
data.body: Skycoin's token platform "Skyledger" launched

data.title: cx.skycoin.net
data.body: CX programming language sandbox published

data.title: Skywire Miner
data.body: Skywire hardware miner prototype built
First marketing and communication people hired
skycoin.net updated

data.title: BBS
data.body: Development of distributed, peer-to-peer social media application (BBS) begins on top of CXO immutable object system

data.title: CXO
data.body: CXO (6th revision of Ether/Aether) ready for implementation

data.title: ICO
data.body: Skycoin ICO is held

data.title: Skywire
data.body: Skywire alpha implemented with a VPN and socks5 proxy demo
Development of Skywire node deployment and orchestration software begins
skycoin.net website launched
Skycoin-Exchange and mobile thin client API development begins

data.title: Blockchain Explorer
data.body: Skycoin Blockchain Explorer launched

data.title: CXO
data.body: Ether+IPFS becomes Merkle-DAG immutable object system, CXO

data.title: Post-Blockchain Research
data.body: Research into Post-blockchain (consensus over total ordering of transactions) to DAG-based UX/TX graph (consensus over equivalence classes of the partial ordering of the directed acyclic bipartite UX/TX graph) begins

data.title: Skywire Research
data.body: Skywire reearch focuses on protection against network level attacks

data.title: CX Research
data.body: Research into CX programming language begins

data.title: Testnet ends
data.body: Skycoin testnet ends, blockchain goes into production

data.title: ACM Published Research
data.body: First academic ACM journal publications about Skycoin's new network consensus algorithm

data.title: Obelisk
data.body: Development of new Cryptopgraphic primitive "public broadcast channel" as found of Skycoin Network Consensus algorithm Obelisk

data.title: Pre-ICO
data.body: Skycoin Pre-ICO begins

data.title: Desktop Wallet
data.body: Development of Skycoin desktop wallet frontend begins

data.title: CoinJoin
data.body: Skycoin transactions redesigned to support CoinJoin natively, with no distinguishing features between CoinJoin and non-CoinJoin transactions
Skycoin secp256k1 hash and deterministic wallet generation algorithm formalized

data.title: Skycoin eliminates signature malleability, transaction malleability and duplicate coinbase problems of Bitcoin
Skycoin concept of directed bipartite UXTX graph developed to replace Bitcoin UTXO
First version of the Skycoin blockchain and testnet launched
Peer-to-peer replicated, key-value store research begins (ether, precursor to aether and CXO)

data.body: Cryptopgraphic library tested and standardized across project

data.title: Coin Hours
data.body: Skycoin develops and implements Coin Hour concept to eliminate transaction fees to miners, while rationing network resources.
Skycoin codebase switched from C to Go

data.title: Research begins on a replacement for PoW consensus
